sentences.en: He won renown as a fair judge.
sentences.cn: 他赢得了公平裁判的荣誉。

sentences.en: She used to be a singer of some renown.
sentences.cn: 她过去是个小有名气的歌手。

sentences.en: In the 60s El-Shinnawy penned the romantic verse that would bring him renown throughout the Arab world.
sentences.cn: 在60年代，埃尔·希纳维写了浪漫的诗句，使他闻名于整个阿拉伯世界。
